T02D3513:159a-1: a'arya dz'am gu l'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3513:159a-3: 'phags ma dz'am gu l'i'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3513:159a-4: 'phags ma dug sel ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3513:159a-5: sems can rnams la brtse ba can //
T02D3513:159a-6: 'phags ma dug sel gzugs can ma //
T02D3513:159a-7: bcom ldan sgrol ma la btud nas //
T02D3513:159a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D3513:159a-9: dang po re zhig sngags pas gtsang zhing khrus byas nas /
T02D3513:159a-10: phreng ba dang gos dkar po bzung ste /
T02D3513:159a-11: skye bos dben pa'i sa phyogs legs par byugs shing
T02D3513:159a-12: dri bzang dkar po'i chus chag chag btab nas me
T02D3513:159a-13: tog dkar po gcal du bkram ste /
T02D3513:159a-14: stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug nas 'gro ba rnams la byams pa dang /
T02D3513:159a-17: btang snyoms rnams rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3513:159a-18: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:svabh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D3513:159a-19: de nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral bar blta'o //
T02D3513:159a-20: de nas pam yig yongs su gyur pa las padma
T02D3513:159a-21: dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam par
T02D3513:159a-22: bya'o // de'i ze'u 'bru la aa yig dkar po
T02D3513:159b-0: yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @159b
T02D3513:159b-1: bya'o // bltas nas / de'i steng du hr'i: yig
T02D3513:159b-2: kha dog dkar po las skyes pa'i bdag nyid 'phags
T02D3513:159b-3: ma dug sel ma sku mdog thams cad dkar mo
T02D3513:159b-4: bya'o // bltas nas / phyag bzhi pa / zhal gcig pa /
T02D3513:159b-6: dkar mo gos dkar pos stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02D3513:159b-7: rin po che'i rgyan dkar pos brgyan pa /
T02D3513:159b-9: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3513:159b-10: rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis pi wang bsgreng bar mdzad pa /
T02D3513:159b-11: g-yon gyi gnyis pas sbrul dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D3513:159b-12: g-yas kyi gnyis pas mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa /
T02D3513:159b-13: zla ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba bsnams pa bsam par bya'o ;
T02D3513:159b-14: / mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang nu ma'i bar
T02D3513:159b-15: du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la a'a:hr'i:h'um gi yi ge
T02D3513:159b-17: de'i rjes su hr'i:yig gi 'od zer gyi nam mkha'
T02D3513:159b-18: la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs te
T02D3513:159b-19: dam tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu byas te rnam
T02D3513:159b-21: dza:h'um bam ho:rab tu sbyor bas so //
T02D3513:159b-22: slar yang hr'i:yig gi 'od zer gyis nam mkha' la
T02D3513:159b-23: bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdan drangs
T02D3513:159b-24: te sems can gyi don la brtson bas kun nas
T02D3513:159b-25: dbang bskur zhing lus kyi nang du zhugs par bsam
T02D3513:159b-26: par bya'o // de bzhin du bsams nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3513:159b-27: hr'i:zhes pa'i sngags 'bum phrag bdun bzlas nas me tog dkar po'i sbyin sreg khri phrag bdun bya'o //
T02D3513:159b-28: rgyan dkar pos rnam par brgyan par bya'o //
T02D3513:159b-29: 'di'i rim pas nam mkha' lding gi dbang phyug nyid
T02D3513:159b-30: kyi mkhas par gyur nas bstan bcos thams cad la
T02D3513:159b-31: 'jigs pa med cing dug thams cad 'joms pa nyid
T02D3513:159b-32: du 'gyur te the tshom med do //
